stimulusHtml: The rate of change of the volume, V, of water in a tank with respect to time, t, is directly proportional to the square root of the volume. Which of the following is a differential equation that describes this relationship?
choicesHtml: V ( t ) = k t MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3C6A@

V(t)=k V MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3C4C@

dV dt =k t MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D31@

dV dt = k V MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D61@

dV dt =k V MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D13@
